title: 107_s249
content: Renewable Energy Development Incentives Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code respecting the renewable resource credit to: (1) include alternative resources. (2) provide an increased credit for certain co-production facilities, and for qualified facilities on Indian and Alaskan Native Indian lands, (3) provide for credit transferability, (4) require facility compliance with pollution laws. And (5) eliminate the January 1, 2002, placed-in-service date for purposes of qualified facility eligibility.
